articles.title: Stock market today: Dow extends slide as Salesforce plunges, rate jitters rattle tech - Yahoo Finance
articles.description: Lingering concerns about higher-for-longer interest rates and a Salesforce sell-off put a damper on investors' spirits.
articles.content:
Warner Bros. Discovery (WBD) CEO David Zaslav is leaning on the company's other sports assets as it remains at risk of losing a key media rights deal with the NBA.

articles.title: Google brings floating picture-in-picture tabs in Chrome on Android - The Times of India
articles.description: TECH NEWS : Google introduces 'Minimised Custom Tabs' in Chrome for Android, enhancing multitasking and app engagement with floating windows and seamless switchin
